pages.text: This writing desk has all the necesary tools to infuse $(l:blank_card)spells scrolls$(/l) with the 5 colors of $(l:mana)mana$(/l), allowing you to make powerful $(l:spellcasting)spells$(/l).$(br2)In the left goes your $(l:blank_card)blank spells$(/l), and in the center goes the $(l:mana)mana$(/l) you want to use. Crafting a $(l:spellcasting)spell$(/l) requires 6 $(l:mana)mana$(/l) of any color.$(br)The $(l:spellcasting)spell$(/l) produced is random, but is influenced by the $(l:mana)mana$(/l) you consume to produce it.
